Material used.Description: HEK293 cells were transfected with plasmids encoding wild-type or A53T mutant alpha-synuclein.

Readout description.Result Description: A53T mutant showed increased protein aggregation compared to wild-type (p < 0.01).

Biological replicates.Description: Three independent biological replicates were performed.

Technical replicates.Description: Each sample was analyzed in triplicate.

Basic positive control.Description: Wild-type alpha-synuclein was used as a positive control.

Basic negative control.Description: Empty vector-transfected cells were used as a negative control.

Statistical analysis method.Statistical analysis method: Two-tailed Student's t-test was used for comparison between groups.

Threshold for normal readout.Threshold for normal readout: Protein aggregation level < 20% of wild-type control.

Threshold for abnormal readout.Threshold for abnormal readout: Protein aggregation level â‰¥ 50% of wild-type control.
